data.title: Stopping thru
data.text: Wasn't expecting much from this place. I was pleasantly surprised. Their biscuit breakfast sandwich and breakfast was very yummy. The coffee was very good too. Will come back.

data.title: Stelllar✨
data.text: This is a really cool place in the growing downtown lake Charles area! If you are a coffee lover {like me} && also like art work and cool design, this is the place for you. I will be coming back to enjoy the coffee and smoothies!

data.title: Great coffee stop
data.text: We wanted some coffee and beignets before leaving Louisiana. We all had something a little different and it was excellent! Everything was made fresh to order, including the Kona coffee which was worth the wait. The frozen vanilla chai latte was heavenly! The beignets were hot and fresh. We loved the local vibe, local art, and decor of this place. It was easy off and on I-10. Great place!

data.title: support local first
data.text: This is the best spot, in the slowly emerging downtown district of Lake Charles, to meet, greet, eat, and just chill out.  Coffee is the best in town, food selection is minimal but very very good, and the friendly staff will treat you like family.  Artwork abounds, and poetry and music events are frequently scheduled.  I recommend the chicken salad croissant with extra jalapeno mayo, and nothing else on it, and the accompanying pickled okra is just the right complement.

data.title: One of my favorite hang-outs
data.text: This is one of our favorite places to meet with other folks in our film-making community. We held our monthly meetings there and I always enjoyed the coffee. I have only eaten a few dished there, but each has been good. There is a great collection of games to play. There are sometimes DVD's or CD's to trade. I even saw a family doing their Christmas presents one day. Good location downtown and cool vibe. Oh, and local art on the walls for you to enjoy and even purchase if you really like it.

data.title: Wonderful to find great coffee and open at 7am
data.text: We stumbled upon Stellar Beans whilst walking looking for somewhere to have an early breakfast.  They make the  BEST coffee!!  and have a great selection of herbal teas and fruit smoothies.  The place has heaps of character with cool tea/coffee cups.  Breakfast menu is pretty good and portions are not over the top.  Staff are really helpful and friendly.  Wished we'd known about this place earlier.

data.title: Nice little apot
data.text: Nice place to stop for a good cup of coffee. We did not try the food, however will come back again. Comfortable atmosphere, friendly staff, and really great lattes.

data.title: Worth the wait
data.text:
Pros:  The food is awesome and is handmade and fresh.
Cons:  Parking sucks.  Sometimes when they get busy you spend about half an hour waiting on your food.

data.title: Stellar is average
data.text: Stopped in for lunch with a party of 3.  Ordered the chicken salad sandwich - it was good, but a little dry.  Fruit on the fruit tray was fresh and tasty.  Nutella sandwich (more like a dessert item) was pretty good!  Tea was made fresh and had a good flavor.  Strawberry smoothie was also good. A little too pricey for sandwiches in my opinion - and I've eaten at a lot of establishments like this one. This coffee shop is small, but has a good vibe - with a couple of sofas and chairs if you want to read. But, NOT good for a group of more than 4.   My party of 3 had to wait about 15 minutes for a table around 1:20 pm. Staff was friendly, but when I asked if/when they serve beignets, all I got was:  "I don't know, maybe on the weekends?" as the answer...which was odd.  I waited around the cashier stand to ask a different employee and got ignored, so I gave up.  I would've appreciated the employee to ask her mgr. if/when they serve beignets since the employee at the register didn't know.  Guess I'll never know about the beignets. Don't think I'll be back, but it was ok for one lunch.

data.title: Good place to get coffee; not far from I-10.
data.text: Location is not far from the Interstate and they make good coffee.  Note that the service is not the fastest, so don't expect to zip in and zip out.  Also, I think it's closed after 3 pm Sun-Thurs., and the beignets are available only Sat-Sun.  The beignets are good.

data.title: Quaint
data.text: My daughter brought me lunch here today. We ordered the brie,bacon,and grape sandwich. Very tasty. She also ordered the chicken enchilada soup. Both very good, the soup was a little on the spicy side which is to be expected, she had gotten it for her 18 month old son and it was too "hot" for him, but I found it delicious.

data.title: Tea
data.text: we visited this coffee shop recently a great atmosphere but they can't make tea properly. They used hot water when it should be boiling and it effects the taste dramatically.

data.title: Great Independent Coffee Shop
data.text: Lake Charles doesn't have a lot of cool places downtown, so we need to support the ones that we do have.  Stellar Beans is one of the few non-corporate coffee shops in town, and it is a really wonderful place.  Everyone who works there is very nice, and the place is clean.  Also, it's the only place I know of to get fresh beignets.  Every latte that I've had there was excellent, and once I had a dirty chai latte, a chai latte with a shot of espresso.  It was spectacular.  Stellar Beans also has tasty sandwiches, and my favorite, a lemon tart covered in fresh fruit and whipped cream.  The best part about Stellar Beans is they support local artists and musicians.    So next time you need a latte or cappuccino, consider spending your money at a locally owned business.

data.title: Neat little place
data.text: A little stark inside, could be a little more cozy, but its better than anyplace else in the area. The iced mocha was ok, not the best I've had, not the worst. I would stop in again if downtown.

data.title: Good Me Place
data.text: This is a very cozy coffee and light food place.A good place to go by yourself to read are work on your laptop.And on A Saturday I was there they had someone playing music..Nothing to dislike about this cool place

data.title: Best Chicken Salad Ever
data.text: Love their homemade chicken salad sandwiches.  A staple in the finest Southern traditions, chicken salad can make or break and event.  Definitely the go to place.  Friendly staff and supportive of the community with special events and accomodations.  Our book club meets there monthly and they provide a big screen TV setup that allows up to SKYPE with authors.  Thanks to Stellar Beans for being so supportive.

data.title: Best chai tea latte ever!!
data.text: Went here recently while passing through the area.  This place was a great find.  Most of us ordered drinks only.  My chai tea latte was one of, if not THE best I've ever tasted!  Very creamy and rich with great flavor.  Lots of locals clearly like this place as well as they had a good crowd of people sitting in there.  Free wifi.  Service was good but the 2 girls working (I think they were sisters) were not really being aware of their actions so they could've been a tad more professional.  But nothing rude or anything like that.  Would definitely recommend this place for the tea.  Others said the coffee was good and one person got a smoothie and loved it.  Another person ordered a breakfast sandwich and said it was good.  The only bummer is that the primary reason for us coming to this place was to get beignets, which were listed on their website.  When we got there, we learned they only offer beignets on certain days and at certain times.  So they probably need to update their webpage as well to reflect that.

data.title: Awesome Little Café to have a GOOD coffee and a GREAT sandwich
data.text:
We haven't really an experienced idea of the coffee culture in the US but this coffee here in that coffeehouse was one of the best we had so far in the US. And the sandwiches you can build yourself, they are just awesome and really delicious. If your are in Lake Charles or just us we were on the trip to Houston, you should stop by, have a coffee and a fuel up :) I recommend that place.
They also offer free wifi.

data.title: Nice coffee shop.
data.text: Good coffee in a welcoming, comfortable setting. The staff are very friendly. The food is fresh and the breakfast menu has good options. The menu in general has a lot of choices. They open early on most days (7:00am). This is my third visit in a week and I'm sure I'll be back before I leave town.

data.title: A Unique Coffee Shop with Good People
data.text: It has good coffee, books to read, also, TV with news on.  They bands  on the week ends with local people it is fun
